A C D F G H M N P S V W

A

Answer - Class in markov
Class with main method for presenting the results of the lab.
Answer() - Constructor for class markov.Answer
 

C

Classifier - Class in markov
This class stores an hmm for each of two classes and has a classify method to classify data according to the most likely class using Bayes theorem.
Classifier(HiddenMarkovModel, HiddenMarkovModel, double) - Constructor for class markov.Classifier
This constructor method takes two hidden Markov models and the prior probability for class 1
classify(double[][]) - Method in class markov.Classifier
This method should use the forward algorithms and Bayes theorem in order to work out the probability that a dataSequence corresponds to class 1 (yes).
combine(Normal) - Method in class markov.Normal
Method to combine two normal densities by averaging their mean and variance

D

Data - Class in markov
This class reads in and stores data from a directory containing a number of Mel frequency cepstrum coefficient (MFCC) vector sequences.
Data(String) - Constructor for class markov.Data
Constructor when the path to the MFCC files is provided
DataWithLabels - Class in markov
This class extends Data to also store state labels associated with the data.
DataWithLabels(String, String) - Constructor for class markov.DataWithLabels
Constructor when the MFCC files and Labelling provided
DataWithWav - Class in markov
This class extends Data to also store sound wave amplitudes derived from the associated WAV files from another directory, and it has a method to return them.
DataWithWav(String, String) - Constructor for class markov.DataWithWav
Constructor when the MFCC files and associated Wav files are provided
density(double) - Method in class markov.Normal
Method to evaluate the density function p(x) at a specified point x

F

forward(double[][]) - Method in class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Forward algorithm - see equation (11) in Section 4.2 of the notes, Input is dataSequence[featureDimension][sequenceLength], Output is the probability of the data sequence under the model

G

getEmissionDensity(int, int) - Method in class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Method for getting the emission probability distribution for a particular feature and state
getLabels(int) - Method in class markov.DataWithLabels
Method to return state label sequence for one example
getLabels() - Method in class markov.DataWithLabels
Method to return state label sequence for all examples
getMfcc(int) - Method in class markov.Data
Method to get the MFCC vectors for one example of size[noMfcc][sequence length]
getMfcc() - Method in class markov.Data
Method to get a list containing all of the MFCC vector sequences, each of size[noMfcc][sequence length]
getNoStates() - Method in class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Method returning the number of states (excluding START/STOP states)
getNumberExamples() - Method in class markov.Data
Method to get the number of examples in the data set
getSoundWave(int) - Method in class markov.DataWithWav
Method to return an array of doubles containing one sound wave scaled to lie between -1 and 1.
getTransitionProbability(int, int) - Method in class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Method for getting the transition probabilities from state i to state j, i,j = 0 to noStates-1 for standard states, i,j = noStates for START/STOP states

H

HiddenMarkovModel - Class in markov
HMM with normal distribution emission density for each feature vector component within each state
HiddenMarkovModel(int) - Constructor for class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Constructor method to create an HMM object with n states and initialise the required arrays
HiddenMarkovModel(int, double[][], Normal[][]) - Constructor for class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Constructor method to build an HMM given known transition and emission probabilities
HiddenMarkovModel(int, ArrayList<double[][]>, ArrayList<int[]>) - Constructor for class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Constructor method to train an HMM using sequence data and given the corresponding data labels, dataList is a list of arrays of size [featureDimension][lengthSequence] storing the MFCC feature vectors for each time segment in each example, labelsList is a list of arrays of size [lengthSequence] storing the corresponding state sequence

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class markov.Answer
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class markov.PlotLabels
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class markov.PlotSound
 
markov - package markov
 
mean - Variable in class markov.Normal
 
mfccRate - Static variable in class markov.Data
Sampling rate for MFCC vectors in samples per second

N

noMfcc - Static variable in class markov.Data
Number of MFCCs used
Normal - Class in markov
Class representing a univariate Normal distribution
Normal(double, double) - Constructor for class markov.Normal
Constructor method to create a normal object given the mean and variance
Normal(double[]) - Constructor for class markov.Normal
Constructor method to create a normal object by fitting the mean and variance to the empirical mean and variance of some data held in an array

P

PlotLabels - Class in markov
Class demonstrating how to read in some MFCC and label file data and which plots the state labels corresponding to an MFCC data sequence.
PlotLabels() - Constructor for class markov.PlotLabels
 
PlotSound - Class in markov
Class demonstrating how to read in some MFCC and wav file data, and plot an example.
PlotSound() - Constructor for class markov.PlotSound
 

S

setEmissionDensity(Normal, int, int) - Method in class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Method for setting the emission probability distribution for a particular feature and state
setTransitionProbability(double, int, int) - Method in class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Method for setting the transition probabilities from state i to state j, i,j = 0 to noStates-1 for standard states, i,j = noStates for START/STOP states

V

variance - Variable in class markov.Normal
 
viterbi(double[][]) - Method in class markov.HiddenMarkovModel
Viterbi algorithm returns the optimal path through the hidden states for an input data sequence: Input is dataSequence[featureDimension][sequenceLength], Output is the inferred most likely path through the hidden states as an array of ints

W

wavRate - Static variable in class markov.DataWithWav
Frame rate in WAV file in samples per second
